title: RV Park Management Software
description: Created a mock RV Park Management Software for the RV Park on Hill Air Force Base for a Weber State Course.

title: SIS API Integration and Data Workflow Automation
description: Automated the process of manipulating data from the Student Information System's API to then upload to applications. This dealt with things like absent notices for the school and constant updates to management software like Google Workspace.

title: YouTube Data Machine Learning Model
description: This was to predict "views" based on certain key factors in a video like length, title, genre, subscriber count, etc. (This was for my Machine Learning Course at Weber State using my interest in the video game "Rocket League")

title: Discord Bot
description: Developed a Discord "Bot" that will give recommendations on "Places to Eat" that are inputted by the user. The bot also does various other things, like store and send information regarding our Esports Club at Weber State.

title: Trackmate - Department Operations Tool
description: Trackmate is a full-stack internal web application designed to help academic departments manage their daily operations. It tracks requisitions, purchase orders, and invoices; monitors employee training completions; and allows viewing and printing of detailed room and class schedules across semesters.
